rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall featuring natural light and decorative elements inspired by Bohemian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area with comfortable seating arrangements, ambient lighting, and artistic decor to evoke a sense of luxury and bohemian charm.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious dining space complementing the living area, with a mix of modern furniture and bohemian decorative elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A state-of-the-art kitchen incorporating traditional Indian motifs and contemporary design, emphasizing functionality with elegant finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A neatly designed guest bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort for visitors.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility room strategically located for storage and maintenance purposes.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: An elegant entrance door with intricate detailing, in accordance with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Living Room Window
openings.description: Large windows to allow abundant natural light, enhancing the bohemian interior design theme.

openings.name: Kitchen Window
openings.description: Functional kitchen window ensuring ventilation and adherence to local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony offering serene views and optimal sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy second bedroom with an attached balcony for relaxation and personal space, maintaining bohemian decor themes.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: An expansive master bathroom with modern amenities and soothing design elements that complement the overall villa aesthetics.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A central staircase providing safe access between levels, integrated into the design to ensure ease of movement while adhering to building norms.

openings.name: Balcony Doorways
openings.description: Separate doorways leading from each bedroom to their private balconies, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles for directional harmony.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance aligned with the auspicious east direction
Open spaces to promote positive energy flow
Balconies facing north or east to maximize natural light
building_norms: Complies with local building codes and structural safety standards in India.
